spell.name: Edgeville Home Teleport
entries: You and up to 8 willing creatures teleport to the Edgeville well. Once succesfully cast, this spell may not be cast again until 30 minutes have passed.

spell.name: Drain
entries: You drain a tiny amount of blood from a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target loses hit points equal to half your level (this counts as necrotic damage for the purposes of resistances and immunities), regain an equal amount of hit points.

spell.name: Freeze
entries: You freeze a creature in place. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, until the start of your next turn, the target's speed is reduced to 0 and it can't use reactions.

spell.name: Muddle
entries: You cause a creature's shadow disorient its creator. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, until the start of your next turn, the target had disadvantage on ability checks and when it makes an ability check it rolls a d4 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.

spell.name: Envenom
entries: You wrap a creature in a light mist of toxic smoke. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the start of your next turn and takes poison damage equal to half your level at the start of its turn.

spell.name: Blood Charge
entries: You take a small amount of blood from a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Charge
entries: You buffet a creature with an assault of icy wind. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice until the end of its next turn, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0 and it can't use reactions.

spell.name: Shadow Charge
entries: You cause a creature's shadow to rise and annoy and disorient it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled until the end of its next turn.
When a muddled target makes an ability check it rolls a d4 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.

spell.name: Smoke Charge
entries: You conjure an acrid wisp of toxic smoke that debilitates a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed until the end of its next turn.
An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws and takes 3d4 poison damage at the start of its turn.

spell.name: Blood Volley
entries: You a small amount of blood from a group of creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 10-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Volley
entries: You buffet a group of creatures with an assault of icy wind. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 10-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice until the end of its next turn, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0 and it can't use reactions.

spell.name: Shadow Volley
entries: You cause a group of creature's shadows to rise and annoy and disorient them. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 10-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled until the end of its next turn.
When a muddled target makes an ability check it rolls a d4 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.

spell.name: Smoke Volley
entries: You conjure an acrid wisp of toxic smoke that debilitates creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 10-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 6d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed until the end of its next turn.
An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws and takes 3d4 poison damage at the start of its turn.

spell.name: Blood Raid
entries: You siphon some blood from a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Raid
entries: You entrap a creature with frigid ice crystals. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next two turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Raid
entries: You cause a creature's shadow to rise and harass and disorient it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next two turns.
A muddled target has disadvantage on ability checks, and when it makes an ability check it rolls a d6 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Raid
entries: You conjure an acrid puff of toxic smoke that debilitates a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next two turns.
An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 4d6 poison damage at the start of each of its turns.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Blood Salvo
entries: You siphon some blood from a group of creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 20-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Salvo
entries: You entrap a group of creatures with frigid ice crystals. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 20-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next two turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Salvo
entries: You cause a group of creature's shadows to rise and harass and disorient them. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 20-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next two turns.
A muddled target has disadvantage on ability checks, and when it makes an ability check it rolls a d6 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Salvo
entries: You conjure an acrid puff of toxic smoke that debilitates creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 20-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 8d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next two turns.
An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 4d6 poison damage at the start of each of its turns.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Blood Rush
entries: You extract a good amount of blood from a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Rush
entries: You surround a creature with freezing air and snow. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes cold damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next three turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
The frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Rush
entries: You cause a creature's shadow to rise and attack and disorient it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next three turns.
A muddled target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and when it makes an attack roll or ability check it rolls a d8 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Rush
entries: You conjure an acrid smog of toxic smoke that debilitates a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next three turns.

An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 5d8 poison damage at the start of each of its turns. If the target is immune to poison damage, it loses that immunity and has resistance instead.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Blood Burst
entries: You extract a good amount of blood from a group of creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 30-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Burst
entries: You surround a group of creatures with freezing air and snow. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 30-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next three turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.
A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Burst
entries: You cause a group of creature's shadows to rise and attack and disorient them. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 30-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next three turns.
A muddled target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and when it makes an attack roll or ability check it rolls a d8 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Burst
entries: You conjure an acrid smog of toxic smoke that debilitates creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 30-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 10d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next three turns.

An envenomed target has disadvantage on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 5d8 poison damage at the start of each of its turns. If the target is immune to poison damage, it loses that immunity and has resistance instead.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Kharyrll (Canifis) Teleport

components.m: 2 Law runes per creature, 1 Blood rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: You crush your runes and you and up to 8 willing creatures teleport to the Hair of the Dog Tavern in Canifis, which is where the an ancient fortress called Kharyrll used to stand in the second and third ages.

spell.name: Blood Blitz
entries: You drain a large amount of blood from a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Blitz
entries: You encase a creature in a solid block of ice. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next four turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.

A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Blitz
entries: You cause a creature's shadow to emerge and assault and disorient it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next four turns.

Attack rolls against a muddled target are made with advantage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and when it makes an attack roll or ability check it rolls a d10 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Blitz
entries: You conjure an acrid cloud of toxic smoke that debilitates a creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next four turns.

An envenomed target has disadvantage (and cannot have advantage) on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 6d10 poison damage at the start of each of its turns. If the target is immune to poison damage, it loses that immunity and has resistance instead.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Blood Barrage
entries: You drain a large amount of blood from a group of creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 40-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes necrotic damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier and must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you regain a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt and the target gains a level of exhaustion. On a successful save, if the target took necrotic damage from this spell, you regain a number of hit points equal to the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Ice Barrage
entries: You encase a group of creatures in solid blocks of ice. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 40-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes cold damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn, and makes a Strength saving throw or be frozen in ice for its next four turns, or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice.

A frozen target's speed is reduced to 0, all attacks against it are made with advantage, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.
A creature frozen by this spell makes another Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Barrage
entries: You cause a group of creature's shadows to emerge and assault and disorient them. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 40-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes psychic damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of your next turn, and must make an Intelligence saving throw or be muddled for its next four turns.

Attack rolls against a muddled target are made with advantage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and when it makes an attack roll or ability check it rolls a d10 and subtracts the number rolled from those rolls.
A creature muddled by this spell makes another Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Barrage
entries: You conjure an acrid cloud of toxic smoke that debilitates creatures. Make a ranged spell attack against each target within in a 40-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. On a hit, a target takes acid damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn (excluding the one caused by this spell), and it must make a Constitution saving throw or be envenomed for its next four turns.

An envenomed target has disadvantage (and cannot have advantage) on saving throws, loses immunity to the poisoned condition, and takes 6d10 poison damage at the start of each of its turns. If the target is immune to poison damage, it loses that immunity and has resistance instead.
A creature envenomed by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.
